This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library('tidyverse')
library('chron')
library('resample')
library('ggplot2')
library('boot')
library('scales')


dados = read_csv('github-users-committing-filetypes.csv')

dados <- dados %>% mutate(data = sprintf("%d-%d-%d", the_year, the_month, month_day)) %>% filter(complete.cases(dados))

dados <- dados %>% filter(file_extension == 'py' | file_extension == 'js')
dados_weekend <- dados %>% filter(is.weekend(data))


amostra_weekend = sample_n(dados_weekend, 500)
amostra = sample_n(dados, 500)


my_statistic <- function(x,i){
  sum(x$file_extension[i]=='go')/length(x$file_extension) * 100
}

boot_proportion = boot(amostra, my_statistic, 5000)
teste <- boot.ci(boot_proportion, conf = 0.95, type = "bca")


boot_proportion_weekend = boot(amostra_weekend, my_statistic, 5000)
teste <- boot.ci(boot_proportion_weekend, conf = 0.95, type = "bca")



```
